ActCanadian Human Rights Act
PrecisAppointment of DAVID L. THOMAS, of West Vancouver, British Columbia, to be Chairperson of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term of seven years, effective September 2, 2014.
